name: Undershadows [2025] DEMO OUT NOW!
description:
NOW ON KICKSTARTER!

KICKSTARTER SUPPORT NOW

DEMO OUT NOW!

It's really hard to describe this Game. I call it a : 

  • 2D Hand-Drawn Point-and-Click Strategy Roguelike RPG

and the humor, 

well a little bit different...

Inspirations:

  • Dragon's Lair (Instant Death, React)
  • Cuphead (Bossfights,Transformations)
  • Undertale (But Passive Bullet Hell System)

The Demo will show not the final product it's a very early build 

(can have many bugs), but you will see:

  • A little Piece of the Prolog
  • The Core Gameplay
  • Battlesystem 
  • Main Event
  • Mini Game Event (The Chef)
  • Boss Fight

Changes:

  • Minimized Difficult (Slower)
  • Cut out few Spoiler based Parts
  • Start with Demo Equipment (extra items)
  • At the First Big Field the Random Part is turned off, for the Demo you can choose between Main & Mini Game

Please! Give the Demo a Try!
